title: Stories of hope and resilience after the deadly tornadoes
itunes:title: Stories of hope and resilience after the deadly tornadoes
description:
A tornado destroyed a Kentucky nursing home. USA Today has the story of how all its residents survived.

Bloomberg looks at the major risks to the economy over the next year.

Many people named Alexa say Amazon’s voice assistant with the same name is changing the way people interact with them for the worse. Some are fighting back. The Washington Post talks to dozens of real-life Alexas.

Steph Curry broke the NBA’s 3-point record. Along the way, he has transformed how basketball is played. ESPN reports on the history-making moment.
